metadata.dc:author: Garriga, Rosa Mar√≠a
metadata.dc:description: Why in the 21st century do women continue to accept and endure the use of physical, verbal and psychological force as an inherent condition to their status as a woman and yet refuse to denounce this violation of their human rights?
metadata.dc:title: Patriarcado como causa de la violencia. La dificultad para identificar relaciones de abuso en el propio hogar.
[Patriarchate as a cause of violence; the difficulty to identify abusive relationships in one's own home].
